text:
10.10. Further Reading 171
 Find Example. Research and ﬁnd an example of a research paper that presents the
results of a deep learning model for time series foresting without comparing it to a naive
forecast or a classical method.
 Additional Limitations. Research and ﬁnd another research paper that lists the limita-
tions of machine learning or deep learning methods for univariate time series forecasting
problems.
If you explore any of these extensions, I’d love to know.
10.10 Further Reading
